title: A photo of Greta Thunberg and Al Gore has been edited to replace him with George Soros
subtitle: The photo has been edited to put George Soros’ face over Al Gore’s.
author: fullfact.org
vclaim:
A photo of Greta Thunberg and Al Gore has been edited to replace him with George Soros

A photo that has been shared widely online claims to show Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg with financier George Soros.

The photo isn’t real. It’s an edited version of a picture Ms Thunberg shared on Twitter in 2018, showing her with former US Vice President Al Gore.

You can read more about how to spot fake images here.

Full disclosure: George Soros is the founder and chair of Open Society Foundations. Between 1 June 2017 and 30 November 2018 Full Fact received a grant from the Open Society Foundations. The grant was restricted to our automated fact checking work. We disclose all funding we receive over £5,000 and you can see these figures here. Our funders have no input into our editorial content.
